name: English Listening Practice
description: English Listening Practice is a free application for learning to speak English. English Listening Practice contains lessons that give special attention to English pronunciation and everyday language.   LISTENING: - Listening to thousand English lessons by native speaker   PRACTICE: - Practice in each lesson after listen.   More English:  1000 Most Common Phrases.  1500 Most Common Words.  Idioms and Phrases in English.  English Idioms & Phrases  English Useful Expressions  Essay for IELTS.  A high TOEFL, IELTS, or TOEIC   Help you learn vocabulary 4-5 times faster  Irregular verbs.  American Slang.  English Idioms by Categories.  English Pronunciation.  Apps Features:  Listen & Read lesson with Audio &Transcripts  Search lesson.  Bookmark manager.  Download audio file.  Background Audio Mode.  Two listen mode: Online or Offline.
